casebody.data:
BSK Enterprises, Inc. and B. Kelley Enterprises, Inc.
v.
Beroth Oil Company No. 117P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016 Guy W. Crabtree, C. Douglas Maynard, Jr., Mark E. Fogel, Attorneys at Law, For BSK Enterprises, Inc., et al. Matthew H. Bryant, Timothy A. Nerhood, T. Paul Hendrick, Attorneys at Law, For Beroth Oil Company. Ryan Connolly, Attorney at Law.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 1st of April 2016 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
